column4: Hi everybody. I'm looking for where I could find my friends on XChat. Could you help me?
We're your friends.
I think you should see it in #ubuntu when you log in?  "Notify: $USER is online (FreeNode) ?
I'm new on irc

xchat? Generally we don't keep a list of friends. We just get along with whatever is going on with the channel. I mean, some people come in here once or twice and that's it. The regulars will be here often.
is "Notify: $USER is online (FreeNode)" a command?
Well -- I added you and it displayed that right away. I'm assuming it'll display that when you already added friends and joined the channel/server.
ok. I think I understood you
Try typing red then use your tab key.
Also...
hi
See? Not too hard. :)
Becouse I want to know if show a warning when I write to you
You mean the red highlight? It allows people to see your message easily. That way you don't miss anything.
When I write now, is it red highlight?
Yes, for me. It is.
My irc client is XChat. what is your irc client?
Same.
bugaloo : Well. I'm using Ubuntu and there is only XChat in the Synaptic. And it is very good
bugaloo : more than pidgin
bugaloo ubottu : thanks a lot and bye bye for now
